original_text: And they sent their disciples to him, along with the Herodians, saying, “Teacher, we know that you are true and teach the way of God truthfully, and you do not care about anyone's opinion, for you are not swayed by appearances.
korean_text: 자기 제자들을 헤롯 당원들과 함께 예수께 보내어 말하되 선생님이여 우리가 아노니 당신은 참되시고 진리로 하나님의 도를 가르치시며 아무도 꺼리는 일이 없으시니 이는 사람을 외모로 보지 아니하심이니이다

sentences.original_text: And they sent their disciples to him
we know that you are true
and teach the way of God truthfully
and you do not care about anyone's opinion
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신은 누구의 의견도 개의치 않으십니다

sentences.original_text: for you are not swayed by appearances
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 당신은 외모에 흔들리지 않으시기 때문입니다
